name: Chocolatey Nicer Packages [Obsolete]
description:
=======================================================================
[ ! ] As of October 2019 this CSS is obsolete, due to Chocolatey site update.
=======================================================================
Restyling of `chocolatey.org/packages` for easier readability and better focus.
additional_info:
2018-07-10: make 'C:\>' inside .nuget-badge non-selectable for easier copy-paste of choco install command.
2018-06-05: make it work only on `https://chocolatey.org/packages/*`.

discussions.name: Nice but please darken some more
